1.content: First up choose your storyline
1.title: Stories

choices: Georgina has something to show you(aware)
11.content:
You had been stopping at your best friends house while she baby sat her little cousin. Georgina had been your best friend for as long as you can remember but even so you had to admit she was a little sexy. Georgina was a curvy girl who was slim but not paper thin. And you couldn't help yourself but look at her plump rear and double D's that you've 'accidently' touched a few times.

She had asked you to come over so She didn't have to sit with her little cousin all alone as she hated little things with a passion.
"Thanks for coming to stay over so I didn't have to sit with 'Her'alone" she says gesturing to her 6 year old cousin on the floor playing with a doll.
"No problem" you reply and give her a little tickle on her long soft feet which she winced at and kicked you.
Just then...
11.title: Story 1 (reserved)

112.content:
"I'll get that Georgina said as she rapidly stood up causing her breasts to bounce and as she turned her was to sway and jiggle. As she leaves the room you look to her cousin

"You having fun there ?" You say as she opens a sweet
"Mmm yeh...wanna a sweetie pop" she says handing you a gummy of some sort.
"Well thank you" you say taking the candy and eating it.
"It's special candy" she says with a smile just then your head begins to feel really heavy and you black out.
112.title: The cousins deadly candy

info.brief_description: You shrink at your friends house try to survive

No rules here let your imagination run wild

info.pretty_title: Shrunk at your best friends house
